content: Brr... what if the fish eat Daikabutomaru... mmph...
Yeee... what goes in now?
Me? I love the smell of soil and plants.
That soft texture... And the taste, it's so fresh! Delicious!
Lively camp, I looove it~
Hey <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I've got something for you!
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, what an astonishing new home!
A floofy home on the clouds~
The fruit on this tree's growin' so well!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, wanna do some farmin' together?
How come... I can't even beat it...?
Where did I hide those other boxes...
It's easier to spot Daikabutomaru from the mountain. I love it!
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, come here~!
Hoho, nice find. Hoho, another one...
Hi, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, Glenn's Stall is now open!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I-I'll do my best to keep up with you... huff...
Mobai!
It's actually the Faintglow House...
Whoa, a brand-new home... of my own!
Don't worry~! I'll do my best to keep up with you.
I'm done for! Can't find it anymore...
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style> invited me. I'm so happy!
The air tastes a lickle sweet and sour.
How embarrassing...
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, please wait...
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, w-wait up!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, where is your home?
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, come with me!
What do I need to prepare to move in?
What should I do...
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, may I ask you something?
I wonder if the fish would eat my seeds if I lived by the river...
Wild~ That's one huge fruit!
Inspection complete!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, over here...
The prophecy... really did happen...
L-Let me taste the air real quick...
Furniture, hats... can I make it in time, moo?
Heave-ho — my crab?!
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, come check out my new house!
This is my first time livin' with someone other than Gran'mama.
Why not just crash into a tree and call it a day...?
Bhan? Is that the Luminescent Stone House?!
Ho? The flowers up there... different colors, hm...
Where could them possibly be...?
Just one more, just one!
I can taste it nearby...
Wild! Let's pick another one...
I can really taste the veggies in the air!
Ah, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, one more thing...
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the Neighbors say...
Just one more, just one!
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, if you have a moment...
...Mmm, save some for me!
I'm hungry...
Where could them possibly be...?
It feels kinda tingly, taking a stroll here...
Where are you hiding... rebellious little pebble!
I'll help you look for stones
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, over here~!
Hoho? This Jar of Luca is already full...
Good view from up here. Perfect for keeping watch.
Cold air sinks, hot air rises... yeah, these should do.
Great view... though living here, you might catch a cold easily.
It seems pretty lively here. Time to make some new friends?
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, your territory has been renovated!
My tummy's growling...
Does something like that really not exist?!
What you're describing... what exactly is it...?
About planet building...
Today's Greenmarket, special offers for today!
Regarding the blueprint, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>...
Could it be... broken?
I also want to take photos, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>!
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, wait...
Hands to the sky, chest open wide, draw your bow from side to side...
Round melon sweet, one chop neat, half for you, half for me...
Come on, let's dance together!
It's not me dancing, it's my ears~!
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! About the Store...
What if it doesn't grow right...? What should I do...?
Hey <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>! Going for a Starsea Voyage?
